mapper.select: SELECT TASK_ID AS taskId, TITLE AS title, DETAIL AS detail, DEAD_LINE AS deadLine, REQUIRED_HOUR AS requiredHour, REQUIRED_MINUTE AS requiredMinute FROM TASK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT TS.TITLE AS title, TS.DETAIL AS detail, TS.DEAD_LINE AS deadLine, TS.REQUIRED_HOUR AS requiredHour, TS.REQUIRED_MINUTE AS requiredMinute, SD.START_DATE_TIME AS startDateTime, SD.END_DATE_TIME AS endDateTime FROM SCHEDULE SD INNER JOIN TASK TS ON SD.TASK_ID = TS.TASK_ID WHERE TS.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TO_CHAR(SD.START_DATE_TIME, 'yyyyMMdd') = #{today}
